Package io.atomix.coordination

Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedGroup.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GroupPartitioner
    Group partitioner.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DistributedGroup
    Generic group abstraction for managing group membership, service discovery, leader election, and remote scheduling and execution.
    DistributedGroup.Config
    Group configuration.
    DistributedGroup.Options
    Group options.
    DistributedGroupFactory
    Distributed group factory.
    DistributedLock
    Facilitates synchronizing access to cluster-wide shared resources.
    DistributedLockFactory
    Distributed lock factory.
    GroupConnection  
    GroupElection
    Group election.
    GroupMember
    A DistributedGroup member representing a member of the group controlled by a local or remote process.
    GroupMemberInfo
    Group member info.
    GroupMessage<T>
    Group member message.
    GroupPartition
    Group partition.
    GroupPartitions
    Group partitions.
    GroupProperties
    Group properties.
    GroupScheduler
    Group scheduler.
    GroupTask<T>  
    GroupTaskQueue
    Group task queue.
    HashPartitioner
    Hash code partitioner.
    LocalGroupConnection
    Local group connection.
    LocalGroupMember
    A DistributedGroup member representing a member of the group controlled by the local process.
    LocalGroupTaskQueue
    Local group task queue.
    RoundRobinPartitioner
    Round-robin partitioner.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TaskFailedException
    Group task failed exception.

Package io.atomix.coordination Description

Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedGroup.
Author:
Jordan Halterman
